thread.title: Texas Motor Speedway Sports Legends VIP Suite Experience
thread.title_full: Texas Motor Speedway Sports Legends VIP Suite Experience

title: Texas Motor Speedway Sports Legends VIP Suite Experience
text:
Big Hoss Ultimate Drive-In Featuring Cars 
SCC Texas will finish off the 2nd Annual Big Hoss Ultimate Drive-In Movie Series on August 8th with Disney and Pixar's Cars! Don't miss your chance to see a race at Texas Motor Speedway like never before! It's because of fundraisers like this that we have been able to give over 9.7 million dollars to the children of North Texas - come enjoy the show and help us reach our goal of hitting 10 million dollars in total giving! 
Just $20 per vehicle, bring your own coolers, snacks and lawn chairs if you like! Concessions and souvenirs will be available on site. Call 817.215.8421 or visit our Events page for more details.
